controller

Class EditorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.EditorController

  • public class EditorController
extends java.lang.Object
    FXML Controller class for the Pattern Editor This controller class handles all the actions performed in the its related view.
    Author:
    Stian Reistad Rogeberg., Terje Leirvik., Robin Sean Aron Lundh.

    • Method Detail

      • initializeEditor

        public void initializeEditor(GameOfLife game,
                             FileController fileController)
        This method clones a game from the main view. It also initializes some keyboard shortcuts and sets the pattern.
        Parameters:
        game - The GameOfLife to be cloned to the main view.
        fileController - is a reference to the class that takes care of saving and reading files.
        See Also:
        FileController

      • handleCloseButton

        public void handleCloseButton()
        This method closes the editor.

      • saveBoard

        public void saveBoard()
        This method will save the board if it is not empty.

      • handleMouseClick

        public void handleMouseClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
        This method calculates where to draw a cell when the user clicks on the canvas.
        Parameters:
        e - is the mouse event that was triggered.

      • saveToGif

        public void saveToGif()
        This method saves the current pattern to the .gif format.
        See Also:
        GIFSaver

      • handleTrimButton

        public void handleTrimButton()
        This method calls the trim() method which reduces the array to smallest possible

      • updateStrip

        public void updateStrip()
        This method updates the strip view with the current pattern when the user clicks a button.

      • trim

        private boolean trim()
        This method ignores empty rows and creates a new trimmed board with the pattern.
        Returns:
        true if the board is not empty.

      • setPattern

        public void setPattern()
        This method sets the pattern with meta data.

      • drawStrip

        private void drawStrip(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc,
                       double offset_X,
                       double stripCellSize)
        This method draws the pattern to the strip view.
        Parameters:
        gc - Is the GraphicsContext buffer used to draw on a canvas.
        offset_X - is the x position from where to draw.
        stripCellSize - is the size of the cells.

      • drawPadding

        private void drawPadding(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc,
                         double start_x,
                         double start_y,
                         double end_x,
                         double end_y)
        This method draws padding around each generations in the strip view.
        Parameters:
        gc - Is the GraphicsContext buffer used to draw on a canvas.
        start_x - is the x-position from where to start drawing the padding.
        start_y - is the y-position from where to start drawing the padding.
        end_x - is x-position where to stop drawing the padding.
        end_y - is y-position where to stop drawing the padding.

      • draw

        private void draw()
        This method draws the pattern.

      • drawGridLines

        private void drawGridLines(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
        This method will draw gridlines if the pattern is over a specific size.
        Parameters:
        gc - Is the GraphicsContext buffer used to draw on a canvas.

      • getPatternWidth

        private double getPatternWidth()
        This method returns the width of the pattern.
        Returns:
        a double value of the width.

      • getPatternHeight

        private double getPatternHeight()
        This method returns the height of the pattern.
        Returns:
        a double value of the height.

      • initializeKeyboardShortcuts

        private void initializeKeyboardShortcuts()
        This method initializes keyboard shortcuts.
